text:
He is Bollywood's Bhai. Even though people have always had divided opinions about him, Salman Khan still manages to rule both the Box-office and hearts of his fans. It's been years since he has been involved in humanitarian work and he leaves no stone unturned in helping people who need his help.
Agencies
Here's another heartwarming example of him having a big heart. Salman Khan's fan Govind requested him to visit his wife’s cancer-stricken nephew at Tata Memorial Hospital. Even though the actor's schedule could hardly squeeze time for a commitment like this, Bhai still managed to take time out for the kid. Salman didn't just visit the kid at the hospital, but he spent time and had a little chat with him too.
Screengrab
The video went viral on the internet in no time and it indeed will manage to melt your heart. Have a look.
